clues.text: Tres tragique was this year when France was first occupied in World War II

Alors!  In this year France lost the battle of Dien Bien Phu & saw revolution begin in Algeria
Vive la Revolution Francaise! which began in this year
Une annee horrible was this year of Napoleon's death, 6 years after Waterloo

rounds.category: HOW DO YOU WORK THIS THING?

clues.text: Put it tightly in place over the drain, release any trapped air & ram the handle up & down
